articles.title: Vice-Chairman of C.C., WPK Meets Lao Party Delegation
articles.content:
Vice-Chairman of C.C., WPK Meets Lao Party Delegation
Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), Saturday met and had a talk with a delegation of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party (LPRP) headed by Sounthon Sayachak, member of the Central Committee of the LPRP and chairman of the Committee for External Affairs of the C.C., LPRP, on a visit to the DPRK.
					 The head of the delegation informed Ri Su Yong of the 10th Congress of the LPRP and expressed the will to further develop the friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties and countries.
					
					 Present there were officials of the C.C., WPK including its Vice Department Director Pak Kun Gwang and Phonekham Inthaboualy, Lao ambassador to the DPRK.

articles.title: Central Committee of WPK Hosts Reception for Delegation of LPRP
articles.content:
Central Committee of WPK Hosts Reception for Delegation of LPRP
Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) hosted a reception in honor of a delegation of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party (LPRP) on a visit to the DPRK on Saturday.
					 Present at the reception on invitation were members of the delegation of the LPRP headed by Sounthon Sayachak, member of the Central Committee of the LPRP and chairman of the Committee for External Affairs of the C.C., LPRP, and Phonekham Inthaboualy, Lao ambassador to the DPRK.
					
					 Present there were Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the WPK, and officials of the C.C., the WPK including its Vice-Department Director Pak Kun Gwang.
					
					 Ri Su Yong said in his speech that the party, government and people of Laos are extending invariable support to the cause of the Korean revolution.
					
					 He wished the Lao party and people bigger success in their struggle for building independent and prosperous Laos under the guidance of respected Bounnang Vorachith, upholding the decision made at the party's 10th congress.
					
					 He said that the DPRK will as ever advance shoulder to shoulder with the Lao people in accomplishing the common cause of socialism against imperialism, true to the behests of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Sounthon Sayachak, on behalf of the Lao party, government and people, expressed thanks to the party, the government and people of the DPRK for their great support and encouragement to the Lao people's struggle for national salvation and socialist construction.
					
					 He wished the fraternal Korean people greater success in achieving the independent reunification of the country and building a socialist power under the wise guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties and countries provided by Kaysone Phomvihane and Kim Il Sung would continue to develop, he stressed.

articles.title: Congratulations to Peruvian President-elect
articles.content:
Congratulations to Peruvian President-elect
Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Saturday sent a congratulatory message to Pedro Pablo Kuczynski on his election as president of the Republic of Peru.
					 The message wished him success in his responsible work for the country's development and progress, expressing the belief that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger in line with the common desire and interests of the peoples of the two countries.

articles.title: Chief Technical Adviser of COSCAP, North Asia Here
articles.content:
Chief Technical Adviser of COSCAP, North Asia Here
Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Wayne Chapin, chief technical adviser of the Cooperative Development of Operational Safety and Continuing Airworthiness Programme (COSCAP) of North Asia of the International Civil Aviation Organization, and his companion arrived here Saturday to take part in the 16th coordinating committee meeting of the COSCAP, North Asia of the ICAO.

articles.title: Lao Party Delegation Here
articles.content:
Lao Party Delegation Here
Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party (LPRP) headed by Sounthon Sayachak, member of the Central Committee of the LPRP and chairman of the Committee for External Affairs of the C.C., LPRP, arrived here on Saturday.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Saturday.
					 Members of the delegation laid a floral basket before the statues of the great leaders before paying homage to them.

articles.title: Rapid Progress Made in Building Ryomyong Street
articles.content:
Rapid Progress Made in Building Ryomyong Street
Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Great miracles are wrought every day in building Ryomyong Street in Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK.
					 The frame-working of 15-storied and other apartments with several thousand flats have been finished up to now, with over 120 flats completed on a daily average.
					
					 Similar progress was also made in framework concreting of more than 20 public buildings.
					
					 Meanwhile, servicepersons and other builders are speeding up the framework of a skyscraper and other projects by introducing advanced methods of construction.
					
					 Thanks to their energetic efforts, the construction of the street is going at fast tempo, startling passers-by and other citizens.

articles.title: Chonjo Spring Water
articles.content:
Chonjo Spring Water
Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- The Chonjo Spring Water Factory was recently completed at the foot of Mt. Koryong in Ryongchon-ri, Sangwon County, North Hwanghae Province.
					 Researchers of the State Nanotechnology Bureau proved that the spring water is as good as those at macrobian localities in some countries and regions of the world.
					
					 It helps promote metabolism in cells and excretion of poisonous matters and is considered to be efficacious for diabetes and colitis. It is also effective in preventing the accumulation of peroxides, aging and cancer.
					
					 The spring water fully conforms to the WHO's standard.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Denounces S. Korean Authorities' "Diplomacy for Pressurizing North"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Denounces S. Korean Authorities' "Diplomacy for Pressurizing North"
Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet authorities have gone to extremes in their "diplomacy for pressurizing the north" in a bid to stifle the DPRK in collusion with outside forces, while vociferating about "its nukes."
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes in a commentator's article in this regard:
					
					 This is an unpardonable challenge and provocation against the good faith of the DPRK to defuse the tension on the Korean peninsula and improve the north-south relations through dialogue and negotiations.
					
					 The south Korean authorities' above-said diplomacy is nothing but a ridiculous behavior of fools going against the trend of the times, failing to judge the invincible might of the DPRK, and a desperate act to escape a final destruction of those who sustain repeated setbacks in the confrontation with it, without knowing where they stand, obsessed with daydream of forcing "the north to dismantle its nukes."
					
					 The DPRK's access to nuclear weapons has nothing to do with the issue of the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities persist in the anti-DPRK racket of "sanctions" in collusion with outside forces while driving the north-south relations to catastrophe under the pretence of "nuclear issue," the DPRK will force them to pay dearly for it.
					
					 Their acts of blatantly challenging to the DPRK's sincere efforts for dialogue and improvement of the north-south relations and escalating the confrontation with the DPRK through the above-said diplomacy will entail disastrous consequences.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group would be well advised to stop the foolish and mean "diplomacy for pressurizing the north," though belatedly, properly understanding that with neither "sanctions" nor "pressure" can they deter the service personnel and people of the DPRK from dynamically advancing along the road of independence, Songun and socialism. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities' diplomacy will bring disgrace and destruction only.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Observes Anniversary of June 10th Independence Movement
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Observes Anniversary of June 10th Independence Movement
Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday says in an article that the June 10th Independence Movement in which the Koreans massively rose up against the cruel colonial rule of the Japanese imperialists in 1926 was an eruption of their long pent-up resentment at the Japanese imperialist aggressors and an expression of their patriotic will to take back the usurped sovereign right of the nation.
					 Though 90 years have passed since then, the people in the southern half of Korea are still groaning under the foreign domination, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 This is a great hurdle lying in the way of achieving the independent and uniform development of the nation.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists, who occupied south Korea following the liberation of Korea from the Japanese imperialists, have viciously obstructed the reunification of Korea and egged the south Korean traitorous ruling quarters onto confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north for the past 70 years, pursuing the strategy for dominating Korea.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are shamelessly distorting history, persistently denying their past crimes against the Korean nation, far from admitting them and making an apology for them.
					
					 What merits a serious attention is that the Japanese reactionaries are going reckless in their moves for launching reinvasion to realize their old dream of the "Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere" under the strong patronage of the U.S. and at its prodding.
					
					 It is none other than the south Korean ruling quarters, a group of traitors, who are zealously joining foreign forces working hard to launch aggression, while infringing upon the dignity and sovereignty of the nation. 
					
					 It is quite natural for the south Korean people of all social strata to wage a strenuous patriotic struggle to achieve the sovereignty of the nation, greatly enraged by the conservative authorities' sycophancy towards the U.S. and submission to Japan.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams Park Geun Hye's Story of "Meaninglessness of Dialogue"
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams Park Geun Hye's Story of "Meaninglessness of Dialogue"
Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Park Geun Hye at "memorial address" on June 6 cried out for "continuing strong sanctions and pressure until the north opts for denuclearization" while viciously slandering the DPRK's bolstering of nuclear deterrence for self-defence. Earlier, she solicited "international cooperation for pressure" to do harm to the fellow countrymen and trumpeted about "denuclearization first and dialogue next" during her overseas trip.
					 Her close confidants are chiming in with their chief executive in spreading the story of "meaninglessness of dialogue".
					
					 Minju Joson Saturday in a commentary says that this is a sordid and frantic story aimed at escalating confrontation and viciously challenging the DPRK's patriotic proposal for dialogue.
					
					 The aim sought by Park Geun Hye and her close confidants in inciting atmosphere of confrontation while spreading the story is to check the victorious advance of the DPRK at any cost, tide over the present ruling crisis and chill the enthusiasm for reunification running high across south Korea with the anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration as a momentum.
					
					 Military provocations being ceaselessly committed by the puppet military warmongers in the southwestern hotspot waters and in the sensitive areas along the Military Demarcation Line clearly prove the dirty aim sought by the puppet authorities in floating the story of "meaninglessness of dialogue".
					
					 Should the south Korean authorities finally opt for war, while spreading the absurd story, we will mercilessly wipe out anti-reunification forces with just war for reunification and achieve without fail the historical cause of national reunification, the cherished desire of the fellow countrymen.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Try to Capture Fishing Boats of DPRK in East Sea
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Try to Capture Fishing Boats of DPRK in East Sea
Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- The south Korean warmongers tried to capture the fishing boats of the DPRK in the open sea beyond the East Sea of Korea at about 3 a.m. on June 8.
					 At that time the two fishing boats were finding the net which had been cut away during the fishing. The south Korean puppet navy warship Kyongbuk secretly appeared near the fishing boats and tried to stop them.
					
					 When the fishermen of the DPRK strongly resisted as it was clear that the south Korean bandit-like naval forces were attempting to seize them, they called even a copter and blinded the fishermen by exploding smoke grenades in a bid to block their way. 30 minutes later, another south Korean puppet navy warship Andong joined the operation. 
					
					 Though the fishermen notified them repeatedly that their boats were returning to their port after fishing operation, the puppet forces attempted to abduct the fishermen at any cost by letting high-speed boats encircle the fishing boats and the copter fly 15 to 20 meters above the sea surface and by firing hundreds of automatic rifle bullets over 20 times.
					
					 In the end, they infiltrated even the third warship of the puppet navy in a bid to siege our fishing boats on the three sides and realize their criminal attempt at any cost.
					
					 As our fishermen shouted that the brigandish act by the puppet forces were reported to the homeland and the People's Army is coming to save them, while fighting it out against the barbarous military violence by the puppet military gangster, they took to flight.
					
					 As their atrocities sparked off the resentment of all fellow countrymen, the south Korean puppet forces went so impudent as to spread a false story that a fishing boat of the north crossed over the extension of the Military Demarcation Line in the waters off Kojin, Kosong of Kangwon Province due to navigation error, and that they "made sure that the fishing boat went back to the north from the humanitarian view of point" at around 07:10 a.m. as the fishermen were confirmed to have had no intention to defect to the south.
					
					 It is none other than the Park Geun Hye group of traitors which unhesitatingly commit ferocious gangster-like act to take to south Korea the fishermen of the north who were conducting peaceful fishing operation in the sea in the wake of the allurement of DPRK citizens in broad daylight in a third country.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces have escalated confrontation with fellow countrymen in the waters of the East Sea of Korea this time, not content with escalating military provocations in the ground, seas and air including the areas along the Military Demarcation Line and in the southwestern hotspot waters in a bid to push the north-south relations to the phase of confrontation and conflict. Their hair-raising atrocities can never be pardoned.

articles.title: Participation in June 15 Korean National Event Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Participation in June 15 Korean National Event Demanded in S. Korea
Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- The South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration launched a strike before the "government" building in Seoul on June 8 for the June 15 event common to the nation.
					 It held a press conference before the kick-off of the strike.
					
					 The speakers accused the south Korean regime of taking negative attitude to the application of the south side delegation for a visit to the north to attend the event common to the nation for marking the 16th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 They demanded the regime roll back the hostile policy towards the north and opt for improving the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 They declared that the south side delegation for the June 15 event common to the nation would continue the strike until June 14 before the Ministry of Unification for the improvement of the inter-Korean relations, re-operation of the Kaesong Industrial Zone and the June 15 event.

articles.title: New Foundation Opposing "Agreement" on Issue of Sexual Slavery Established in South Korea
articles.content:
New Foundation Opposing "Agreement" on Issue of Sexual Slavery Established in South Korea
Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- The south Korean civic and public circles established a new foundation for preserving justice on June 9 in opposition to the puppet group's humiliating "agreement" with Japan on the issue of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, according to the south Korean online paper Voice of People.
					 The organizations including the Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps held a press conference for the establishment of the foundation in Seoul that day.
					
					 The speakers said that they would contribute to reinstating the honor and human rights of the victims by seeking a just solution to the sexual slavery such as making Japan admit its past crimes, probe the truth, make an official apology and legal reparation and punish those responsible and thus help the younger generation properly understand the issue of sexual slavery by promoting education in history and holding memorial service.
					
					 They called on the increasing number of citizens to participate in actions for properly understanding the issue of sexual slavery.

articles.title: S. Korean Newspaper Accuses Puppet Military Group of Its Pro-Japanese Act
articles.content:
S. Korean Newspaper Accuses Puppet Military Group of Its Pro-Japanese Act
Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- The south Korean newspaper Hankook Ilbo disclosed mean behaviors of the puppet military group toward Japan on June 7.
					 Right after the talks between the Japanese and south Korean puppet military authorities were held in Singapore, the Japanese minister of Defence openly claimed that both sides reached a consensus of views on the issues of satisfactorily ensuring the bilateral liaison system including the one of raising the director-level hotline between his ministry and south Korean Ministry of Defense to the minister-level one.
					
					 On the other hand, the puppet military authorities said ambiguously that whether to increase circuits or raise the level is a matter to be consulted additionally.
					
					 In this connection the newspaper questioned the Ministry of Defence why it is taking a low-key attitude whenever it stands before Japan, adding that it took such defensive attitude as regards its military diplomacy towards Japan several times before.

articles.title: Anniversary of Publication of June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Observed in Thailand
articles.content:
Anniversary of Publication of June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Observed in Thailand
Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- A lecture took place at Rajabat Pranakorn University of Thailand on June 7 on the occasion of the 16th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 Present at the lecture were figures of the Thai Preparatory Committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, the Thailand-DPRK Friendship Association and the university and masses.
					
					 Chanai Longoen, chairman of the friendship association, referred to the fact that the north-south summit was held in Pyongyang in 2000 for the first time and the June 15 joint declaration adopted there, reflecting the ideal of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 The main spirit of the joint declaration clarifies that the reunification of Korea should be achieved by concerted efforts of the Koreans and through great national unity in line with the will and wishes of the Korean nation, he said, and went on:
					
					 The issue of Korea's reunification is not the one limited to the Korean peninsula but the one directly linked with world peace and security.
					
					 The peaceful reunification of Korea, prosperity common to the nation and world peace and security depend on upholding and implementing the ideal of By Our Nation Itself, the main spirit of the joint declaration.
					
					 I hope that Korea would be reunified independently through great national unity in line with the ideal of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 I fully support the Korean people's just struggle.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Observed in India, Angola
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Observed in India, Angola
Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Events took place in foreign countries on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 They included round-table talks and film show in India and a lecture in Angola on June 5 and 7.
					
					 Speakers including the senior leader of the Indian People's Party, secretary of the National Council of the Communist Party of India and the secretary general of the All India Indo-Korean Friendship Association praised Kim Jong Il for developing the WPK into the party of President Kim Il Sung both in name and in reality, an ideological pure entity, an integral organization and the party which has achieved the unity of actions, saying that the development of the WPK into an invincible party would be unthinkable without him.
					
					 They noted that the exploits Kim Jong Il performed for building and leading the party would shine forever along with socialist Korea which is making a long drive under the guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The director for social education of the Committee of Angola for Friendship and Solidarity with Peoples gave a lecture.
					
					 He said: The WPK is the party absolutely supported and trusted by the people. Its secret lies in that it is serving the people.
					
					 Kim Jong Il who regarded it as his lifetime motto to believe in the people as in Heaven paid great attention to developing the WPK into the motherly party which takes care of the people's destiny in a responsible manner.
					
					 The participants of the film show watched the Korean film "Mirae Scientists Street".

articles.title: Books Praising Peerlessly Great Men of Mt. Paektu Published in Peru
articles.content:
Books Praising Peerlessly Great Men of Mt. Paektu Published in Peru
Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Books and a collection of poems praising the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu were published in Peru on the occasion of the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The books are titled "Reply of Korea" and the "DPRK seen from a new angle" and a collection of poems "Shining Country in the East".
					
					 The book "Reply of Korea" authored by Estuardo Martinez Perez deals with the immortal Songun revolutionary leadership exploits the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu performed by protecting the destiny of the country and nation and putting the country on the position of a nuclear weapons state and a satellite manufacturer and launcher with the original Songun politics and the unshakable will of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to meet all challenges of the imperialist allied forces and thoroughly accomplish the cause of the Juche revolution and the cause of socialism.
					
					 The book "DPRK seen from a new angle" written by Yuri Castro Romero introduces the service personnel and people of the DPRK who have stepped up the building of a socialist power and the cause of national reunification, frustrating the moves of the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces to isolate and stifle the DPRK under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea led by the peerless Songun brilliant commander in high esteem.
					
					 The collection of poems "Shining Country in the East" by Cati Campos Rontop deals with the advantages of Korean-style socialism under which the dream and the ideal of the people are coming true under the wise guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un who is making ceaseless journeys of devoted service for the prosperity of the country and the happiness of the people, possessed of the same noble loving care for the people and the younger generation as that of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A book releasing ceremony was held in Lima on June 2.

articles.title: Pyongyang Introduced by Peruvian Newspaper
articles.content:
Pyongyang Introduced by Peruvian Newspaper
Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian Callao Daily on June 1 allotted one whole page to an article titled "Looks of Pyongyang, modern City".
					 It said:
					
					 The capital city of the DPRK can be described as the one not known well to the world owing to the negative reports released by Western media.
					
					 However, Pyongyang is a new city which is modern and in good order and has a lot of monumental structures.
					
					 Its avenues are clean and decorated with flowers and cars running under the traffic control by beautiful girls are adding beauty to its landscape.
					
					 There is a big river in the middle of the city and the Sci-Tech Complex was successfully built on the islet in the middle of the river.
					
					 Several bridges help the citizens travel to the city center and districts on its outskirts with thickly wooded hills.
					
					 The newspaper carried photos of President Kim Il Sung's birthplace in Mangyongdae, the Arch of Triumph, the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace and Pyongyang Koryo Hotel with explanations.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita a electo presidente peruano
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita a electo presidente peruano
Pyongyang, 11 de junio (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 11 un mensaje de felicitacion a Pedro Pablo Kuczynski, electo presidente de la Republica Peruana.
					El remitente expresa la conviccion de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises se ampliaran y se desarrollaran conforme al deseo y los intereses comunes de los pueblos de dos paises y desea al destinatario exitos en sus responsables trabajos para el desarrollo y la prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: Minju Joson revela objetivo de Park Geun-hye de negar propuesta de RPDC
articles.content:
Minju Joson revela objetivo de Park Geun-hye de negar propuesta de RPDC
Pyongyang, 11 de junio (ACNC) -- En su discurso pronunciado el dia 6 con motivo del "dia de conmemoracion de los caidos en la lucha anti-Norte", Park Geun-hye calumnio el fortalecimiento del disuasivo nuclear autodefensivo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea diciendo que "mantendra la sancion y presion fuertes hasta cuando el Norte de Corea opte el camino de desnuclearizacion". Con anterioridad, durante su viaje al extranjero, pidio la "cooperacion de presion internacional" destinada a perjudicar a los connacionales e insistio en la "desnuclearizacion primero, dialogo despues".
					Sus lacayos fieles se suman a la insistencia de la mandataria en el "sinsentido del dialogo".
					
					En un comentario individual divulgado el dia 11, Minju Joson lo denuncia como teoria de confrontacion frenetica, opuesta a la iniciativa patriotica de la RPDC de realizar el dialogo.
					
					El objetivo de hacer circular esta teoria por Park y sus lacayos residen en frenar de toda manera la marcha victoriosa de la RPDC y salir de la crisis de su gobernacion y echar agua fria al fervor de la reunificacion que reina en toda la extension del Sur de Corea en visperas del dia de publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, revela el periodico y continua:
					
					En junio, los belicistas titeres surcoreanos cometen sucesivamente las provocaciones militares en las aguas candentes del mar sudoeste y en las inmediaciones de la Linea de Demarcacion Militar, lo que demuestra claramente la  intencion malsana de las autoridades titeres que divulgan la teoria del "sinsentido del dialogo".
					
					Si las autoridades surcoreanas optan por fin el camino de guerra divulgando la injusta teoria, la RPDC eliminara sin piedad a las fuerzas anti-reunificacion y lograra sin falta la causa historica de la reunificacion de la patria, anhelo de la nacion coreana.

articles.title: Titeres surcoreanos tratan de secuestrar a barcos de RPDC en Mar Este de Corea
articles.content:
Titeres surcoreanos tratan de secuestrar a barcos de RPDC en Mar Este de Corea
Pyongyang, 11 de junio (ACNC) -- A eso de las tres a.m. del dia 8, los belicistas de la capa militar titere del Sur de Corea intentaron secuestrar a fuerza los barcos pesqueros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea que estaban en la pesca en las aguas internacionales del Mar Este de Corea.
					Cuando los dos barcos pesqueros de la RPDC estaban buscando la red perdida se acerco sigilosamente el buque de guerra surcoreano "Kyongbuk" y trato detener sin motivo alguno nuestros barcos pesqueros.
					
					Nuestros pesqueros resistieron a toda costa al intento de secuestro de las piratas maritimas surcoreanas.
					
					Estos bandidos surcoreanos llamaron hasta el helicoptero que lanzo la bala de fumigena para impedir el avance de nuestros barcos.
					
					30 minutos despues, aparecio el buque de guerra "Andong" de las fuerzas maritimas del Sur de Corea.
					
					Pese a que nuestros pesqueros aclararon reiteradamente que estaban en regreso de la pesca, los piratas surcoreanos hicieron cercar con los botes de alta velocidad a los barcos pesqueros de la RPDC. Tambien, el helicoptero surcoreano volo a 15~20 metros sobre la superficie del agua produciendo fuertes oleadas marinas y disparando cientos balas de ametrallador en 20 ocasiones.
					
					Por ultimo, movilizaron hasta el tercer buque de guerra para cercar nuestros barcos. 
					
					Cuando nuestros pesqueros gritaron que "ya hemos informado a la patria vuestros crimenes bandidescos y ahora viene aqui nuestro ejercito para salvarnos", los gangsteres militares surcoreanos huyeron apresuradamente.
					
					Tales actos criminales causaron las indignaciones de todos los coreanos.
					
					Entonces, los titeres surcoreanos estan divulgando cinicamente la mentira, segun la cual en el mar frente a Kojin de Kosong de la provincia de Kangwon, un barco norcoreano traspaso la linea de demacracion militar maritima por equivocacion de ruta y una vez que fue confirmada su voluntad de no sumision, "permitieron regresar a la parte nortena a eso de las 7:10 cumpliendo su obligacion humanitaria".
					
					Antes los titeres surcoreanos secuestraron en pleno dia a nuestras ciudadanas en el pais extranjero y hoy dia intentan llevar a fuerza a nuestros pesqueros que estaban en pesca. Esto es la actitud gangsteril de la banda traidora de Park Geun-hye.
					
					No recibiran nunca la disculpa los actos criminales de los titeres surcoreanos que insatisfechos con la intensificacion escalonada de sus provocaciones militares en las inmediaciones de la linea de demacracion militar y en la tierra, mar y cielo de las aguas candentes del Mar Sudoeste de Corea, esta vez se dedicaron a la confrontacion fratricida en las aguas del Mar Este de Corea.
